name: WildFire (itch) (donaldcmarks)
description:
A Physics Based Platformer where Fire runs WILD. Be careful of what you walk on/jump on. You may just burn down your own plans!

NOTE: When game PAUSES on Level 01 during Sling, press SPACE. The game is NOT crashed, it is pause/ask for user input to emphasize controls during tutorial level!! Have fun!

A joint project between Donald Marks and Nicholas Poole! Enjoy!
